name: Science Digital
tagline: Basic demonstrations and examples to prove a point ;-)
body:
This site / account is used to host some basic examples for various topics. Some of my comments on the internet (reddit, YouTube, ...) will link to some of my examples. Many examples do not make sense without context and may be documented in German or not at all.

If you have questions feel free to create a ticket.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
